name: ring-target
effect: Held : When one of the user’s types would render it immune to damage, that type is ignored for damage calculation.
short_effect: Held: Negates the holder’s type immunities. Ability immunities are not removed.

flavor_text.black_white: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Moves that would otherwise have no effect will land on the Pokémon that holds it.
